installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# StarRupture Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
# Image to install with is 'ghcr.io/parkervcp/installers:debian'

set -e

## Install packages
apt -y update
apt -y --no-install-recommends install curl lib32gcc-s1 ca-certificates software-properties-common

## Add i386 architecture for steamcmd
dpkg --add-architecture i386
apt update

## Set steam user
if [[ "${STEAM_USER}" == "" ]] || [[ "${STEAM_PASS}" == "" ]]; then
    echo -e "Steam user is not set."
    echo -e "Using anonymous user."
    STEAM_USER=anonymous
    STEAM_PASS=""
    STEAM_AUTH=""
else
    echo -e "User set to ${STEAM_USER}"
fi

## Download and install steamcmd
cd /tmp
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamcmd
curl -sSL -o steamcmd.tar.gz https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/client/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz
tar -xzvf steamcmd.tar.gz -C /mnt/server/steamcmd
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamapps
cd /mnt/server/steamcmd

# Fix permissions
chown -R root:root /mnt
export HOME=/mnt/server

## Install game using steamcmd
echo "Installing StarRupture Dedicated Server..."
./steamcmd.sh +force_install_dir /mnt/server/server_files \
    +login ${STEAM_USER} ${STEAM_PASS} ${STEAM_AUTH} \
    +@sSteamCmdForcePlatformType windows \
    +app_update ${SRCDS_APPID} validate \
    +quit

## Set up 32 bit libraries
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk32
cp -v linux32/steamclient.so ../.steam/sdk32/steamclient.so

## Set up 64 bit libraries
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk64
cp -v linux64/steamclient.so ../.steam/sdk64/steamclient.so

## Create savegame directory
mkdir -p /mnt/server/server_files/StarRupture/Saved/SaveGames

## Change to server directory
cd /mnt/server/server_files

echo "-----------------------------------------"
echo "Installation completed..."
echo "Server will start on port ${SERVER_PORT}"
echo "Connect in-game to set passwords"
echo "-----------------------------------------"
